title: 436. Forget Everything You Know About Your Dog
description: As beloved and familiar as they are, we rarely stop to consider life from the dog’s point of view. That stops now. In this latest installment of the Freakonomics Radio Book Club, we discuss Inside of a Dog with the cognitive scientist (and dog devotee) Alexandra Horowitz.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
